long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better keyboard control, a dark mode, and more for the NY Times Crossword.

* Hold shift to use pencil temporarily, double tap to switch.
  - Alternatively, you can use Caps Lock to switch (activate from control panel).

* Use shortcut Alt-P (Option-P) to pause/unpause the timer.

* Activate dark mode from the puzzle's control panel (gear icon). Preserves yellow and blue highlights, and keeps shaded squares visible, while saving your eyes.

* Activate red pencil from the control panel, to make pencil stand out.
